[1m[4mMacros with Quoted Attributes[0m

Test all macros that support positional attributes with quoted values.

> Block Image <
> Inline Macros <
Inline image:  [Image: icon.png]

Icon with quoted title:  [Icon: heart]

> Audio and Video <
[3m[Audio: podcast.mp3][0m[3mtutorial.mp4[0m> Edge Cases <
Image with comma:  [Image: chart.png]

Image with multiple attributes:  [Image: mountain.png]
